Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to determining whether a releasee shall be detained pending a preliminary or final revocation hearing
Summary: Relates to determining whether a releasee shall be detained pending a preliminary or final revocation hearing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to determining whether a releasee shall be detained pending a preliminary or final revocation hearing
